text: it is time to officially recognize
Jerusalem as the capital of Israel when
President Trump made this announcement
one man likely smiling was Republican
mega donor Sheldon Adelson the staunchly
pro-israel casino magnate gave twenty
five million dollars to a political
action committee supporting Trump and
five million to Trump's inauguration
festivities the two weren't always on
the same page during the campaign Trump
said the billionaire was trying to make
Marco Rubio his perfect little puppet
but Adelson who's a college dropout who
grew up poor eventually got behind Trump
once he won the Republican nomination
but during Trump's first summer in
office Adelson was disappointed that the
president hadn't moved the American
Embassy from Jerusalem to Tel Aviv on
day one of his presidency like he said
he would but now that Trump is
recognizing Jerusalem as Israel's
capital he seems to be setting in motion
a plan to move the embassy on Jerusalem
should ultimately form to share former
shared capital between the Israeli and
Palestinian states the move has been
called reckless by foreign leaders and
goes against the wishes of the
secretaries of state and defense
but faced with disappointing evangelical
and pro-israel backers like Adelson or
alarming the rest of the world the
president sided with his base and with
one of his biggest donors
[Applause]
[Applause]
